title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: When the editor is dirty, and the menu is popped up, two Revert options are visible.
EB: There is only one Revert option, and it is correctly disabled when the editor is dirty.
SR: Ensure that the Revert option is displayed only once in the popup menu and is appropriately disabled when the editor is dirty.
